A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
The movie spends so much time attempting to portray what it falsely sees as a sophisticated view of morality that it forgets that heroes are meant to be heroic.
Although it attempts to give us some justification for why Kylo Ren is the way that he is\, it mostly fails to make us believe that the villains of the movie have any sincere mission.

Nothing interesting\, exciting\, groundbreaking\, just a massive dud. This director will single handedly ruin was was once great if they let him continue. JJ Abrams at least kept the heart going\, Rian Johnson is basically a loser.
